msbt.message: Ooh! Did you know this tidbit about ?When it comes to , apparently they're quite enamored with .

I didn't know that. Are you sure?
So, it seems doesn't have any special skills. At least, that's what they believe. Not to pry, but were you aware of this, ?
Yes. I knew that.
I didn't know that. Are you sure?
Ah! Of course. You two do seem quite close. No doubt you tell each other everything! To be honest, I'm a bit jealous. Who wouldn't want a friendship like that?
Well, they told me so themselves So it must be true, mustn't it?You know, talks to me about lots of things. One might even say I'm a trusted confidant!
Wellthat's the rumor, anyway. I didn't hear it firsthand, so I'm not entirely sure it's true, I suppose You know what, I'll just ask them myself next time I see them, .
, a question Do you know what kind of prefers?
I do. Yes. Of course.
I don't. I have no idea.
Why, , do you happen to know if has any favorite ?
I do. Yes. Of course.
I don't. I have no idea.
By the by, do you happen to know if has a dream job of some kind?
Yes. I know.
I don't. I have no idea.
Not to be a busybody, but do you know if has any hobbies?
Yes. Oh, I know.
I don't. I have no idea.
I'm curious—do you happen to know if has any special skills to speak of?
I do. Yes. Of course.
I don't. I have no idea.
Ah. Yes. Of course you would know. You two do seem quite close. You must tell each other everything. To be honest, I'm a bit jealous. I just hope they'll confide in me as well one day.
YOU don't know? ButI was so sure you would, !I confessI'm dying to know what kind of music they like.They have such good taste, surely it's something I should be listening to as well.
Oh my! That's too bad, .I'm just terribly curious about what kind of books they enjoy reading. It says so much about a person, no? Ah well, next time you see them, ask them for me, won't you?

YOU don't know? ButI was certain you would, !I admitI'm terribly curious to know what kind of comics they read. Surely I should be reading them too! Ah well, I'll just have to ask them myself the next time I see them.
Oh my! That's too bad, .I'm just dying to know what kind of movies they enjoy watching. It can be quite revealing, can't it? Ah well, next time you see them, do find out for me, won't you?

YOU don't know? Butbut I was so sure you would have the scoop, !It's justI'm terribly anxious to know what kind of TV shows they watch. They have such good taste, surely I should be watching them too.

Oh my, I see It's just, I really wanted to know what kind of sport they enjoy. It's not really my thing, darling. Still, I thought they might have a good recommendation. I suppose I'll just have to ask them the next time I see them, .
Oh fiddlesticks! I was so sure you would, .Call me nosy, but I'm dying to know what kind of drink they like most.They have such fabulous taste, surely it's something I should be drinking as well.
Oh my! That's too bad, .Honestly, darling, I'm dying to know what kind of food is their favorite. It can be quite revealing, can't it? Ah well, next time you see them, do find out for me, won't you?

Really? YOU don't know? Butaren't you curious at all?To know what someone's dream job is, is to know a piece of their heart.Well, I suppose I shall just have to ask them myself the next time I see them, .
Oh my! I see! Butaren't you curious at all?To know what someone's hobby is, is to know what truly brings them joy, . Perhaps I'll just ask them the next time I see them.
Surely you jest! YOU don't know? Butyou must be curious!Knowing someone's special skill is like knowing their superpower!I really must ask them the next time I see them, .
, I'm curious Are you and close friends?
Of course!
Eh, not really...
My goodness, ! Hearing you answer so boldly makes me feel a bit jealousI wish I were good friends with . I just know we'd get along famously.
I thought as much, . But tell me thisWhen it comes to , do you like as much as does?
Yep. I sure do.
Nope. Not so much.
I'm not surprised, . But when it comes to , tell me this is a huge fan of ! Are you as well?
Yep. I sure am.
Nope. Not so much.
I thought as much, . So does that mean you love too? said it was one of their very favorite !
Yep. I sure do.
Nope. Not so much.
I thought as much, . But when it comes to your favorite , tell me this absolutely loves . Do you as well, my dear?
Yep. I sure do.
Nope. Not so much.
I thought as much, . But tell me this, Since you two are such good friends, do you also dream of becoming ?
Yep. I sure do.
Nope. Not so much.
I am not surprised, . But tell me this, considers being one a dream job. Do you as well?
Yep. I sure do.
Nope. Not so much.
Just as I thought, . But tell me this, Since you two are such good friends, have you also taken up as a hobby?
Yep. I sure have.
Nope. It's not my thing.
I'm not surprised, . But tell me this, has taken it up as a hobby. Have you as well?
Yep. I sure have.
Nope. It's not my thing.
Just as I thought, . But there's something I can't help but wonder, Since you and are so close, have you also picked up as a skill?
Yep. I sure have.
Nope. It's not my thing.

Hardly a surprise, . But I do wonder about something,
considers it their special skill. Do you as well?
Yep. I sure do.
Nope. Not so much.
Ah yes, I thought as much. But, , I really must ask you something Since you and are so close, does this mean you don't listen to music either?
Music's not my thing. I'm not into music.
I listen to music. Music is cool.
Ah yes, I thought so. Butdoes that mean you don't read books?I'm not judging, darling, buteh I understand doesn't read books. At all.
I don't read books. Books aren't my thing.
I read books. Books are great!
Ah yes, I thought as much. But I do have a question, .If you and are so closedoes this mean you don't read comics either?
I don't read comics. Comics aren't my jam.
I read comics. Comics are rad!
Hehe. I thought you might say that. But I must askdoes that mean you don't watch movies? I'm not judging, but I understand doesn't watch movies. At all.
I don't watch movies. Movies aren't my jam.
I watch movies. Movies are great!
Ah yes, I thought as much. But I do have a question, . I understand does not watch TV. At all. Sodo you go without it as well, ?
I don't watch TV. TV isn't my thing.
I watch TV. TV is great!
Haha! Of course you are! Now, you know I hate to be nosy, but I must ask you something. I understand does not enjoy sports. Do you feel the same, ?
Yeah. I feel the same. I'm not into sports.
No. I feel differently. I'm into sports.
Hehe. I thought you might say that. SoI have a funny little question to ask you. I understand doesn't have a favorite drink. Does that go for you as well?
Yeah. I feel the same. I don't have a favorite.
No. I feel differently. I do have a favorite.
Haha! Of course you are! Now, you know I hate to be nosy, but I must ask you something. I understand does not have a favorite food. Does that go for you as well, ?
Yeah. I feel the same. I don't have a favorite.
No. I feel differently. I do have a favorite.
Well, well, I am not surprised. Now, I hate to be a busybody, but I am curious, I understand has not settled on a dream job to pursue. Does that go for you as well?
Yeah. It does. Yeah. I don't either.
No. I have one. I have a dream job.
Hehe. I thought you might say that. SoI have a funny little question to ask you, . I understand doesn't have a hobby. Not even one! Doesthat go for you as well?
Yeah. It does. I don't have a hobby.
No. Not at all. I have a hobby.

Hehe. I thought you might say that. Now, I'm not one to judge, but I do have a question to ask you. It seems doesn't have any special skill to speak of. Or so they seem to think. Does that go for you as well, ?
Yeah. It does. No special skills here.
No. Not at all. I've got skills, alright.
I see. I see. That makes sense. Birds of a feather flock together, as they say. Anyhoo, it must be nice to have so much in common with your dear friend. Do be sure to cherish it!
That's perfectly fine, my dear. Good friends don't need to have everything in common. I'll let you in on a little secret Sometimes it's the differences that make our friendships even stronger.
Oh, really? Since they invited you to the island, I thought for sure that you were. Silly me! Anyhoo, with your charming personality, I'm sure you'll be BFFs in no time, .
HmmI see. I see. Well, that won't do, will it?I know! I'll share a bit of insider info I happen to have. Then YOU use it to jump-start your friendship.
Alrighty then, here's what I know, When it comes to , absolutely loves ! So next time you see them, chat with them about . You'll be besties in no time!
Alrighty then, here's what I know, When it comes to , absolutely loves ! So next time you see them, chat with them about . You'll be BFFs in no time!
So, here's what I know, .If you invite to a meal, be sure to prepare for them. Of all the out there, THAT is their favorite. Just think of all the points you'll score by serving it.
So, here's what I know, .If you invite to a meal, be sure to serve them . Of all the out there, THAT is their favorite. You'll make quite the impression by serving it.
Alrighty, here's the scoop, When it comes to dream jobs, wants very much to become . So next time you see them, bring it up casually. Before you know it, you'll have a new BFF!
Alrighty, here's the scoop, A great . THAT is what dreams of becoming. So next time you see them, bring it up casually. Before you know it, you'll have a new best friend.
Now listen closely, Our dear has a hobby, and it is . So next time you get together, ask all about . You'll be best friends in no time!
Now listen closely, I understand that has a beloved hobby, and that is . So next time you get together, ask ALL about it. I promise you'll be best friends in no time!
Alrighty, here's the scoop, is very good at . It's their special skill, you see. So next time you see them, be sure to ask all about it. You'll be fast friends after that, my dear.

Alrighty, here's the scoop,
THAT is what is good at. It's their special skill! So next time you see them, bring it up casually. Before you know it, you'll have a new best friend.
So here's a little secret doesn't listen to music at all. At all, .So when you spend time together, choose someplace that's quiet. You might find you have a new BFF!

So here's a little secret is not into books. At all, .So next time you hang out together, find something other than books to discuss, my dear. Knowing you, you'll think of something fabulous to chat about and make a new friend to boot.

So here's a little secret is absolutely NOT into comics, . So next time you hang out together, find something other than comics to discuss, darling. Knowing you, you'll think of something clever and fabulous and make a new friend to boot.

So here's a little secret doesn't watch movies. At all, . So next time you two hang out, maybe grab or listen to some instead. Knowing you, you'll think up something clever and fabulous and win a new friend along the way.

So here's the scoop, is not into watching TV. Not even a little bit. So if you two are going to chitchat, maybe talk about or music. Anything but TV. Knowing you, you'll think up something clever and fabulous and win a new friend along the way.

So here's a little secret is not into sports. Not at all, . So if you two are going to hang out, maybe grab or listen to some instead. Knowing you, you'll think up something clever and fabulous and win a new friend along the way.

Alrighty, here's the scoop, doesn't really enjoy any kind of drink. None. Not even . So, darling, next time you two hang out, try serving up YOUR favorite drink. I have a hunch will like itand like you!

Alrighty, here's what I know, doesn't truly enjoy any type of food. It's true! Not even ! So, my dear, next time you two hang out, try serving up YOUR favorite food.I have a hunch will like itand like you! You'll be besties before you know it.

So, here's a little secret doesn't have any job ambition whatsoever. So, next time you two spend time together, try talking about your dream job and your own ambitions. Perhaps will find it inspiringand find a new best friend as well, .

Now, here's what I know doesn't have any hobbies to speak of. Not one! So, next time you two chat, try talking about your own hobbies, . Perhaps will find it inspiringand find a new best friend at the same time.

Alrighty, here's the scoop doesn't have any special skills. Or so they think. So, next time you two spend time together, try brainstorming what they might be. I have a hunch will find it helpfuland will find a new best friend as well.
